all_questions.question: What are the measures used for evaluating the performance of the neural networks?
all_questions.context: Centival evaluation, classification accuracy, centival average similarity

all_questions.question: Why is the glove embeddings baselines considered excellent in these measures?
all_questions.context: The baselines such as bag of words are very good in these measures

all_questions.question: What type of representation emerges automatically when training neural network systems?
all_questions.context: Our representations which emerge automatically when we train these neural network systems

all_questions.question: Which dataset is used for the evaluation in this document?
all_questions.context: COCO dataset that's the of the Davis-Bulden index

all_questions.question: What are some alternatives to glove embeddings mentioned in the document?
all_questions.context: Bag of words is also a very good way of representing sentences
